paper_abstract: This paper deals with convergence and stability of exponential Runge-Kutta methods of collocation type for delay differential equations. It is proved that these kinds of numerical methods converge at least with their stage order. Moreover, a sufficient condition of the numerical stability is provided. Finally, some numerical examples are presented to illustrate the main conclusions. (C) 2010 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Exponential Runge-Kutta methods for delay differential equations
